conclusion: Since sin(0°) = 0, but refraction occurs, there is an error in the analysis.
The incident ray is not at 0° to the normal; the normal at point P is perpendicular to the tangent of the circle at P.
Refractive index calculated as 0.866 is unusual for glass, indicating a mistake.
The angle i shown in the diagram is the angle of refraction inside the glass, not in air.
